name: Challenging Hero Rescue Missio
description:
Challenging Hero Rescue Mission is the best robot games with flying robot having hero flying robot skills and accompanied with falcon robot shooting drones on enemies and flying falcon will complete super city rescue mission in police super battle in this super robot game. This war is fought by robot which is fight against gangsters and enemy eagle robot to save it from evil futuristic enemies and eagle robot. Stop the evil and conquer gangster squad in city survival mission as captain has amazing super powers and falcon robot of flying robot games .

- Amazing City Environment to explore
- Superb Flying Robot Hero
- Great Flying Robot Controls and Animations
- Easy and smooth controls
- Eye-catching city environment
- High Quality 3D Graphics and Sound Effects
- Interesting scenarios for flying hero game lovers.
